task.title: Integrating DITA-SEMIA into the oXygen default framework

li.p: You integrated DITA-SEMIA into DITA-OT of the oXygen default framework (see ).

context.p: You must add the folder dita-ot/plugin/org.dita-semia.resolver to the custom locations for frameworks to activate the DITA-SEMIA frameworks:

step.cmd: In the menu on the left, open Document Type Association Locations .
Below the list Additional frameworks directories, click Add.
In the dialog Choose frameworks directory, select the directory [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/DITA/dita-ot/plugin/org.dita-semia.resolver.
Close the Preferences window with OK and restart oXygen to apply the changes.
